scripts.start: docker-compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml -p one-line-story --env-file ./docker/.env.prod build && docker-compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml -p one-line-story --env-file ./docker/.env.prod up
scripts.dev: docker-compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml -p one-line-story-dev --env-file ./docker/.env.dev build && docker-compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml -p one-line-story-dev --env-file ./docker/.env.dev up
